title: Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF)
subtitle: LVEF Calculator & Visualization
description: Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) is a measurement of the percentage of blood leaving your heart each time it contracts.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) is a measurement of the percentage of blood leaving your heart each time it contracts.

visualization.title: Visual Analysis
visualization.description: Advanced visualization techniques for cardiac assessment using echocardiography and gradient-weighted class activation mapping (Grad-CAM).

results.title: Experimental Results
results.description: Comparative analysis of LVEF assessment methods and their clinical applications.
